statements: DELETE FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_id = 101 AND delivery_performance < 4.5;
DELETE FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE quality_performance > 3.8 AND communication_performance < 4.0;
DELETE FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A';
DELETE FROM supplier_scorecard WHERE supplier_id = 100 AND on_time_delivery = TRUE;
DELETE FROM kpi_metrics WHERE kpi_actual < kpi_target;
DELETE FROM supplier_scores WHERE supplier_id = 1 AND supplier_name = 'ABC Suppliers';
DELETE FROM performance_evaluation WHERE evaluation_id = 10 AND supplier_id = 5;
